text: Pen Lom bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok, kɨli Jon nop takaw anɨb ak tek nep agnɨŋɨd agelɨgɨpal, Chɨn tɨtay dɨnɨgun agelɨgɨpal? Agel kɨlop agolɨgup, Nɨbi binbɨ ogɨnap kɨlop gɨ tɨmel ma gɨnɨmɨb, tap kɨlop si ma dɨnɨmɨb agolɨgup. Takaw yepɨs agɨl tap kɨlop si ma dɨnɨmɨb agolɨgup. Wog nɨbi ke gɨpɨm, mani nɨbi ke anɨb anep dɨnɨmɨb agolɨgup.
